name: Lazy Gun Run
description:
Welcome to Lazy Gun Run. A simple, fun, run and gun!

Game Overview

Outrun or shoot down the monsters ahead to rack up your score! Play in Full screen!

PC/MAC/Linux users

Use your mouse to click the onscreen buttons to jump over and shoot at the monsters!

Android Users

The game cannot be played on this page on a mobile device, download it from the play store using the link below! (coming soon)
